hero.title: The BluePrint Series: Design Futures with Sarah Chen

introduction.title: INTRODUCTION OF THIS EVENT
introduction.description: Join us for an inspiring conversation with Sarah Chen, the visionary designer behind some of tech's most iconic interfaces. Explore the intersection of AI, design, and human experience in this exclusive Blueprint Series event.

agenda.title: REGISTRATION AND WELCOME
agenda.description: Check in and enjoy light refreshments while networking with fellow attendees

agenda.title: KEYNOTE: DESIGNING FOR AI
agenda.description: Sarah Chen shares insights on creating human-centered experiences in an AI-driven world

agenda.title: COFFEE BREAK
agenda.description: Network and discuss key takeaways from the keynote

agenda.title: PANEL DISCUSSION
agenda.description: Industry leaders discuss the future of design and technology

eventDetails.description: Part of The Gradient's Blueprint Series, this event brings together leading voices in design and technology. Moderated by Elena Rodriguez, the discussion will explore how designers are shaping the future of human-AI interaction and what it means for the next generation of digital experiences.

faq.question: WHAT IS THE SCHEDULE FOR THE EVENT?
faq.answer: The event runs from 2:00 PM to 5:00 PM, including registration, keynote presentation, networking break, and panel discussion.

faq.question: IS THIS EVENT SUITABLE FOR BEGINNERS?
faq.answer: Absolutely! While we'll discuss advanced topics, the content is accessible to designers at all levels. It's a great opportunity to learn from industry leaders.
